sql-statements.statement: SELECT doc_id, doc_id_alias, doc_message_digest, doc_mime_type, doc_header, doc_spec_type, doc_spec_subtype, doc_source_id, doc_source_type, doc_source_subtype, doc_source_system, doc_name, doc_description, doc_orig_stamp, doc_recv_stamp, doc_data_a AS owner_id FROM Document WHERE doc_id = ?
SELECT doc_content_small, doc_content_large FROM Document WHERE doc_id = ?

SELECT Document.doc_id as message_id, to_char(Document.doc_orig_stamp - :2, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS send_on, Document.doc_recv_stamp AS read_on, Document.doc_source_id AS from_id, Document.doc_name AS subject, Document.doc_content_small AS message, Document.doc_data_a AS permed_id, Document.doc_data_b AS priority, Document.doc_data_c AS common_message, Document.doc_source_system, attr_repatient.value_text AS repatient_id, attr_repatient.value_int AS deliver_records, attr_repatient.value_textB AS return_phone, initcap(repatient.simple_name) AS repatient_name, attr_phones.value_text AS return_phones FROM Person repatient, Document_Attribute attr_phones, Document_Attribute attr_repatient, Document WHERE Document.doc_id = :1 AND attr_repatient.parent_id (+) = Document.doc_id AND attr_repatient.value_type (+) = 331 AND attr_repatient.item_name (+) = 'Regarding Patient' AND attr_repatient.value_text = repatient.person_id (+) AND attr_phones.value_type (+) = 10 AND attr_phones.item_name (+) = 'Return Phones' AND attr_phones.parent_id (+) = Document.doc_id
SELECT value_text AS cc_person_id FROM Document_Attribute WHERE parent_id = :1 AND value_type = 330 AND item_name = 'CC'

SELECT TO_CHAR(cr_stamp -:3, 'IYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as when, person_id AS person_id, value_text AS notes, value_int AS private FROM Document_Attribute WHERE parent_id = :1 AND value_type = 0 AND item_name = 'Notes' AND (value_int = 0 OR person_id = :2)
SELECT item_id FROM Document_Attribute WHERE parent_id = :1 AND value_type = 330 AND item_name IN ('To', 'CC') AND value_text = :2
SELECT value_text AS to_person_id FROM Document_Attribute WHERE parent_id = :1 AND value_type = 330 AND item_name = 'To'
SELECT doc_id FROM Document WHERE doc_data_a = ?
